                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495931539501705" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEfChDRPj?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 23:37" date="1587397072000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495931539501705:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 23:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：最好的爱，是成全】关于爱，每个人都有自己的理解。不管方式如何，最重要的一定是能够为对方带去点什么。如果你不知道怎么表达你的爱，那就去成全你爱的那个人。其实，成全一个你爱的人，也是在成全自己的爱。这种微妙的羁绊，也是一世的温暖。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495931539501705:1022-article:1022%3A2309404495931541159979:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495931539501705:2803301701" title="【夜读】最好的爱，是成全" href="http://t.cn/A6wHqJak" alt="http://t.cn/A6wHqJak" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>【夜读】最好的爱，是成全</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

        <!--区别处理-->
        <div class="WB_feed_spec WB_feed_spec_c S_bg1 S_line1 clearfix" action-type="widget_articleLayer" action-data="url=https%3A%2F%2Fweibo.com%2Fttarticle%2Fp%2Fshow%3Fid%3D2309404495931541159979&amp;target=_blank" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_card:4495931539501705:1022-article:4495931539501705:1022%3A2309404495931541159979:page_100206_home:2803301701:230940:2803301701:4495931539501705:2803301701:230940" exp-data="key=tblog_weibocard&amp;value=1022-article:4495931539501705:ori:4495931539501705:page:2803301701:230940&amp;src=//rs.sinajs.cn/j.gif">
        <div class="spec_box clearfix">
            <div class="WB_feed_spec_pic S_bg1 WB_feed_spec_pic_h">
                <a href="javascript:void(0)">
                    <img ratio="2.5" src="https://wx2.sinaimg.cn/large/a716fd45ly1ge0km2duaxj20rs0fm4ji.jpg" alt="【夜读】最好的爱，是成全" title="【夜读】最好的爱，是成全">
                </a>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495926712787851" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEfuvbHfl?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 23:18" date="1587395921000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495926712787851:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 23:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【习近平在陕西考察秦岭生态保护情况】习近平总书记20日在陕西考察调研。当天下午，他首先来到位于商洛市柞水县的秦岭牛背梁国家级自然保护区，考察秦岭生态保护情况。之后前往小岭镇金米村，了解脱贫攻坚工作情况。（文字记者：杜尚泽&nbsp;&nbsp;摄影记者：鞠鹏、谢环驰、燕雁、翟健岚） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【@ 全国大学生，已有<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2317%E4%B8%AA%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BD%E6%98%8E%E7%A1%AE%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#17个省份明确高校开学时间#</a>】截至4月20日晚，安徽、上海、云南、江西、河南、陕西等17省区市已公布高校计划开学时间，你的大学定了没？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BD%E6%98%8E%E7%A1%AE%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#多省份明确高校开学时间#</a>↓↓转发，持续更新中！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E7%81%AF%E5%85%89%E7%A7%80%E6%84%9F%E8%B0%A2%E8%B1%AB%E6%B9%98%E7%B2%A4%E6%A1%82%E7%90%BC%23&amp;from=default">#武汉长江灯光秀感谢豫湘粤桂琼#</a>】随“豫”而安、“湘”互扶持、“粤”来越好、兵“桂”神速、“琼”尽全力……武汉长江灯光秀感谢河南、湖南、广东、广西和海南。这个春天的到来，离不开英雄的你。谢谢你们为武汉拼过命！致敬！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495920823978955:1034-video:1034%3A4495916984369177:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495920823978955:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wH2FWR" alt="http://t.cn/A6wH2FWR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495920060112312" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEfjM0tdu?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 22:52" date="1587394334000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495920060112312:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 22:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【人民微评：炒票，严惩！】天价国际机票肥了少数人，却让航空公司背了骂名，更拦住了海外同胞回家的路。票价惊人，与供不应求有关，也与不法中介有关。暂停代理企业销售国际机票，特殊时期的无奈之举，反衬出一些代理肆无忌惮无底线。倒票、炒票涉嫌违规违法，必须制止，更需依法处理。                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4495811985111917" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民日报" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民日报</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E8%88%AA%E5%B1%80%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%9C%BA%E7%A5%A8%E7%82%92%E8%87%B310%E4%B8%87%E5%85%83%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%23&amp;from=default">#民航局回应国际机票炒至10万元以上#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9A%82%E5%81%9C%E4%BB%A3%E7%90%86%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E9%94%80%E5%94%AE%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%9C%BA%E7%A5%A8%23&amp;from=default">#暂停代理企业销售国际机票#</a>】中国民用航空局运行监控中心副主任孙韶华透露，调减国际航班后，少数代理企业通过虚占座位、更换旅客姓名等方式倒票、抢票，有的机票炒到10万元以上。民航局要求4月16日起暂停各销售代理企业的国际机票代理权，全部国际渠道必须通 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495811985111917:2803301701" href="/2803301701/IEcvslrQh" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495811985111917">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【谢谢每一份爱的回馈！致敬<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%94%A8%E8%A1%8C%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%A0%E9%80%92%E7%9A%84%E6%9A%96%E6%84%8F%23&amp;from=default">#疫情中用行动传递的暖意#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】她是留学生，隔离结束后，选择到隔离点做志愿者，“把温暖传递下去”；他是新冠疫苗志愿者，他说自己只是个普通人，“有太多人为我们拼过命，现在该轮到我了”…这是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E8%AE%A9%E4%BA%BA%E6%B3%AA%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%E6%9A%96%E5%BF%83%E5%9B%9E%E9%A6%88%23&amp;from=default">#疫情中让人泪目的暖心回馈#</a>↓谢谢你们，所有感受过温暖并将它传递的人。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【冰雪世界！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B9%9D%E5%AF%A8%E6%B2%9F%E4%B8%8B%E9%9B%AA%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#九寨沟下雪了#</a>】4月20日，一场雪让九寨沟成了梦幻般的冰雪世界，游客们纷纷与漫天飞雪合影。大雪把九寨沟拉回到冬季，海子的碧蓝与雪的纯白相呼应，四周白茫茫一片，安静得仿佛时间静止了一般。当天有694名游客来到九寨沟景区旅游，与童话世界亲密接触。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495903992268363:2017607-video:2017607%3A4495862504554533:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495903992268363:2803301701" title="红星视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wTS5Nh" alt="http://t.cn/A6wTS5Nh" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>红星视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IEeO19gxr&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609499823&amp;ssig=IqyjfgVVgO" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495900372208529" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEeO19gxr?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 21:34" date="1587389640000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495900372208529:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 21:34</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E5%AF%B9%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E5%88%9D%E4%B8%89%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广州对返校初三高三学生全部核酸检测#</a>】4月20日，广州市副市长黎明透露，广州决定对首批返校的近3万名教职员工、16.7万名初三和高三学生全部开展核酸检测。今后一段时间，广州将根据防控工作的需要，不断动态调整应检尽检的对象。<a title="广州：对返校初三、高三学生全部开展核酸检测" href="http://t.cn/A6wTgvo3" alt="http://t.cn/A6wTgvo3" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>广州：对返校初三、高三学生全部开展核酸检测</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E5%80%92%E8%AE%A1%E6%97%B6%23&amp;from=default">#疫情下的高考倒计时#</a>！转发，为梦想加油<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】今天，随着湖北确定2020年高考时间，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%90%84%E5%9C%B0%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E7%A1%AE%E5%AE%9A%23&amp;from=default">#全国各地高考时间全部确定#</a>。因疫情延迟开学、延期高考，他们被网友称为"最难的一届高考生"。因疫情见证历史，这一届考生注定不凡。距全国高考还有不到80天，做好防护，专心备战。转发，为高考生加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <li>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【祝福！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E4%BC%9F%E4%B8%BD%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E5%BD%92%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#张伟丽平安归国#</a>】4月20日晚，成功卫冕UFC女子草量级世界冠军的中国女选手<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%BC%A0%E4%BC%9F%E4%B8%BDMMA?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=张伟丽MMA">@张伟丽MMA</a> 从美国平安抵达天津，将在天津接受隔离14天。她表示：“感谢大家的关心。飞机上都很顺利。体温都正常。我们终于回来了，走的时候还在下雪，现在已经春暖花开了。等待检疫，隔离。” ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【教育部考试中心：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%235%E6%9C%88%E6%89%98%E7%A6%8F%E9%9B%85%E6%80%9DGRE%E7%AD%89%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E5%8F%96%E6%B6%88%23&amp;from=default">#5月托福雅思GRE等海外考试取消#</a>】20日，教育部考试中心发布通知<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%235%E6%9C%88%E5%A4%9A%E4%B8%AA%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E5%8F%96%E6%B6%88%23&amp;from=default">#5月多个海外考试取消#</a>：①取消2020年5月所有托福、雅思、GRE、GMAT考试，考试费将全额退还至考生个人报名账户。②取消2020年5月16日举行的KET、PET青少版考试。③推迟举行原定于2020年5月16、23、30日举行的剑桥商务 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEerR7B5Q" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495886631810886:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495886631810886&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4495886631810886&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

                                <a name="4495883632623628" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEen1b0wA?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 20:27" date="1587385650000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495883632623628:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 20:27</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【我国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%90%E5%B9%B4%E4%BA%BA%E4%BA%BA%E5%9D%87%E9%98%85%E8%AF%BB%E7%BA%B8%E8%B4%A8%E4%B9%A64.65%E6%9C%AC%23&amp;from=default">#成年人人均阅读纸质书4.65本#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%89%E6%88%90%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%9C%89%E5%90%AC%E4%B9%A6%E4%B9%A0%E6%83%AF%23&amp;from=default">#三成以上中国人有听书习惯#</a>】20日，第十七次全国国民阅读调查成果发布。从成年国民对各类出版物阅读量的考察看，2019年我国成年国民人均纸质图书阅读量为4.65本，低于2018年的4.67本；有三成以上的国民有听书习惯。一波书单推荐↓↓今天，你读书了吗？ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#安徽开学时间#</a>公布！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A15%E6%9C%886%E6%97%A5%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E7%94%9F%E5%92%8C%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E5%B9%B4%E7%BA%A7%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%23&amp;from=default">#安徽高校5月6日研究生和毕业年级返校#</a>】据安徽省教育厅，5月6日，符合要求的高校研究生和毕业年级学生返校。第一批学生返校后1-2周，由各高校根据首批学生返校情况，自行评估确定其他年级学生返校日期。目前尚在国境外的教职员工和学生，暂不返校。此外，在压实属地、企业、高 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEe2yjqZ4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495870944631962:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495870944631962&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IEdYXdgZd&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609499834&amp;ssig=ugZ0gQMDq%2B" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495868713163563" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEdYXdgZd?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 19:28" date="1587382093000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495868713163563:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 19:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【四川<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E5%B8%82%E6%A3%AE%E6%9E%97%E7%81%AB%E6%83%85%E8%B5%B7%E7%81%AB%E5%8E%9F%E5%9B%A0%E5%88%9D%E6%AD%A5%E6%9F%A5%E6%98%8E%23&amp;from=default">#西昌市森林火情起火原因初步查明#</a>】据西昌市护林防火指挥部办公室消息，2020年4月20日14点20分许，西昌市樟木箐镇李家沟村一组发生森林火情。起火原因初步判断为当地一名租住村民在房屋内做饭过程中意外由灶炉烟囱引燃房外柴火导致山火，公安机关已将嫌疑人控制并带回依法处理。目前无人员伤亡 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEdYXdgZd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495868713163563:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495868713163563&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【致敬！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2320%E4%BD%8D%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%95%99%E5%AE%88%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#20位重症专家留守武汉#</a>】援鄂医疗队陆续回撤后，根据救治工作需求，20位专家继续留守武汉指导救治工作。20日，中央指导组与继续留守武汉的多学科重症救治专家座谈，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%AE%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%82%89%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%A4%E7%90%86%E6%AF%8F%E4%B8%80%E4%BD%8D%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#中央要求悉心护理每一位患者#</a>。这次留守武汉的20位多学科重症诊疗专家始终战斗在最前线，承担了大量急难险重救治任务。你们辛 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEdVNA9sh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495866758616157:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495866758616157&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8E%A6%E9%97%A8%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E5%B9%B3%E6%B5%81%E9%9B%BE%E5%AE%9B%E8%8B%A5%E4%BB%99%E5%A2%83%23&amp;from=default">#厦门出现平流雾宛若仙境#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】19日下午，福建厦门上空出现平流雾景观。在观音山、会展中心一带上空，雾气涌动，宛若仙境。这是今年以来平流雾美景第二次“光临”鹭岛，气象专家介绍，平流雾是暖湿空气平流到较冷的下垫面上，下部冷却形成雾气，多发生在冬春时节。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8E%A6%E9%97%A8%E5%B9%B3%E6%B5%81%E9%9B%BE%23&amp;from=default">#厦门平流雾#</a><a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495858576113919:2017607-video:2017607%3A4495824852287499:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495858576113919:2803301701" title="新华网的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wTZEZz" alt="http://t.cn/A6wTZEZz" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>新华网的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E8%B0%B4%E8%B4%A3%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B9%E6%94%BF%E5%AE%A2%E6%8A%B9%E9%BB%91%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E8%AD%A6%E6%96%B9%E6%8B%98%E6%8D%95%E8%A1%8C%E5%8A%A8%23&amp;from=default">#外交部谴责西方政客抹黑香港警方拘捕行动#</a>：依法执法不容抹黑】20日，外交部发言人耿爽表示，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E8%AD%A6%E6%96%B9%E4%BE%9D%E6%B3%95%E6%89%A7%E6%B3%95%E4%B8%8D%E5%AE%B9%E6%AD%AA%E6%9B%B2%E6%8A%B9%E9%BB%91%23&amp;from=default">#香港警方依法执法不容歪曲抹黑#</a>，对于香港特区警方依法采取的拘捕行动，个别西方政客说三道四，横加指责，甚至公然要求警方撤销控罪，这是对中国香港事务的粗暴干涉，是对香港法治和司法独立的严重践踏。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEdG30xJ8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495856990129650:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495856990129650&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495841416504296" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEdgVri40?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 17:39" date="1587375584000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495841416504296:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 17:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4266%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新增4266例新冠肺炎#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8520%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新冠肺炎累计确诊超20万#</a>】据西班牙卫生部20日公布的数据，西班牙较前日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例4266例，新增死亡病例399例，累计确诊病例达200210例，其中20852人死亡，80587人痊愈。（姜波）<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%88%90%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%AC%AC2%E4%B8%AA%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8520%E4%B8%87%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙成全球第2个确诊超20万国家#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E9%9D%9E%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E5%B9%B4%E7%BA%A7%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#上海非毕业年级开学时间#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%8C%E5%88%9D%E4%BA%8C5%E6%9C%886%E6%97%A5%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#上海高二初二5月6日开学#</a>】据上海教育，上海在做好4月27日高三、初三年级返校开学工作的基础上，高二、初二年级于5月6日返校开学；高中、初中其他年级以及小学四、五年级于5月18日返校开学；小学一、二、三年级和幼儿园的返校开学安排，视疫情防控形势另行确定。培训机构 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEdahyo3P" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495837298195645:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495837298195645&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E6%9C%9D%E9%98%B3%E5%8C%BA%E6%88%90%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%AB%98%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#北京回应朝阳区成疫情高风险地区#</a>】4月20日，北京市政府新闻办举行发布会，北京市疾控中心副主任庞星火回应<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%9C%9D%E9%98%B3%E5%8C%BA%E5%88%97%E4%B8%BA%E9%AB%98%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#北京朝阳区列为高风险地区#</a>：按照国家关于依法科学精准做好新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知要求，各地需要根据当地新冠肺炎疫情情况，进行风险分级和分类防控。高风险地区的分级标准为累计确诊 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEd5Em6dy" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495834425267120:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495834425267120&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC49%E4%BA%BA%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E8%BF%9D%E8%A7%84%E5%87%BA%E9%97%A8%E8%A2%AB%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#北京49人居家观察期间违规出门被处理#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%9D%90%E5%9C%B0%E9%93%81%E9%80%9B%E5%95%86%E5%9C%BA%E8%81%9A%E9%A4%90%E8%A2%AB%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#一居家观察人员坐地铁逛商场聚餐被处理#</a>】今天下午，北京社区防控组办公室成员、北京市委组织部部务委员徐颖透露，极个别居家观察人员思想麻痹大意、自我约束不严、违背自身承诺，未能做到“足不出户”。3月下旬以来，根据群众监督和有关排查线索，我们通过 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEcZSeiHA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495830843408486:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495830843408486&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4495830843408486&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            </ul>
        </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E7%BE%8E%E9%AB%98%E5%AE%98%E7%A7%B0%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%9B%A4%E7%A7%AF%E9%98%B2%E6%8A%A4%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E7%89%9F%E5%88%A9%23&amp;from=default">#外交部回应美高官称中国囤积防护设备牟利#</a>：颠倒是非、指鹿为马】美国白宫贸易与制造业政策办公室主任纳瓦罗称，中国囤积个人防护设备牟取暴利。耿爽回应：仅以中国向美国提供的抗疫物资为例，他的谎言就不攻自破。3月1日至4月17日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%AF%B9%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E5%90%84%E7%B1%BB%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A918.64%E4%BA%BF%E5%8F%AA%23&amp;from=default">#中国对美国提供各类口罩18.64亿只#</a>，医用及其他手套2.58 亿双， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEcWfDXAu" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495828599523850:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495828599523850&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%80%BF%E7%88%BD%E4%B8%89%E4%B8%AA%E4%BE%8B%E5%AD%90%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E7%BE%8E%E6%96%B9%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%B5%94%E5%81%BF%23&amp;from=default">#耿爽三个例子回应美方要求中国赔偿#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%9A%84%E6%95%8C%E4%BA%BA%E6%98%AF%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#美国的敌人是病毒不是中国#</a>】外交部发言人耿爽20日主持例行记者会。有记者提问说，特朗普在19日的白宫新冠疫情简报会上称，仍希望调查人员去中国调查新冠疫情。他周六还警告称，如果中国明知疫情扩散，可能“需要承担责任”，还有一些美官员要求中国为美国疫情 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEcL2CUDg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495821649274162:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495821649274162&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%9C%9F%E6%96%B9%E7%8E%B0%E5%84%BF%E7%AB%A5%E5%B0%B8%E4%BD%938%E4%BA%BA%E8%A2%AB%E5%88%91%E6%8B%98%23&amp;from=default">#小区土方现儿童尸体8人被刑拘#</a>】记者从河南省新乡市原阳县政府获悉，18日在原阳县盛和府小区土方堆放场内，发现4具儿童尸体。经初步调查，公安机关已对建筑工程负责人、挖掘车司机等涉嫌重大责任事故犯罪的8名嫌疑人刑事拘留。<br>目前，当地政府已成立市县事故联合调查组全面展开调查。调查组初步判断 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEcHhuFju" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495819317308652:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495819317308652&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7359597987" usercard="id=7359597987">小甜爱追星</a><a title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://kefu.weibo.com/faqdetail?id=20848"><span class="icon_icon"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans"></i></span></a>：很对，有些工地封锁不严，小孩很容易悄悄溜去玩，农村里家长对孩子看管不严教育也不到位，大型机械死角多，操作员观察不到位                    </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E9%87%8D%E5%A4%A7%E6%B0%B4%E5%88%A9%E5%B7%A5%E7%A8%8B%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%8D%E4%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#湖北介绍重大水利工程复工复产#</a>情况】4月20日下午四点，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第79场新闻发布会，介绍湖北省重大水利工程复工复产情况，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495816389229521:1034-video:1034%3A4495824793567265:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495816389229521:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wTvo11" alt="http://t.cn/A6wTvo11" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E8%88%AA%E5%B1%80%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%9C%BA%E7%A5%A8%E7%82%92%E8%87%B310%E4%B8%87%E5%85%83%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%23&amp;from=default">#民航局回应国际机票炒至10万元以上#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9A%82%E5%81%9C%E4%BB%A3%E7%90%86%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E9%94%80%E5%94%AE%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%9C%BA%E7%A5%A8%23&amp;from=default">#暂停代理企业销售国际机票#</a>】中国民用航空局运行监控中心副主任孙韶华透露，调减国际航班后，少数代理企业通过虚占座位、更换旅客姓名等方式倒票、抢票，有的机票炒到10万元以上。民航局要求4月16日起暂停各销售代理企业的国际机票代理权，全部国际渠道必须通 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEcvslrQh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495811985111917:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495811985111917&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家移民管理局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%97%A5%E5%9D%87%E6%A3%80%E6%9F%A5%E4%BA%A4%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%90%E8%BE%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%91%98%E5%B7%A52%E4%B8%87%E5%A4%9A%E4%BA%BA%E6%AC%A1%23&amp;from=default">#日均检查交通运输工具入境员工2万多人次#</a>】20日，国家移民管理局边防检查管理司司长刘海涛表示，目前，全国边检机关日均检查交通运输工具入境员工2万多人次，占入境总人数7成多。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495807975445226:1042163-video:1042163%3A4495807903367178:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495807975445226:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wYeXpT" alt="http://t.cn/A6wYeXpT" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%B7%B2%E5%BC%95%E5%8F%91%E8%81%9A%E9%9B%86%E5%9E%8B%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#入境城市本土关联病例已引发聚集型疫情#</a>】国家卫生健康委宣传司新闻发言人、副司长米锋介绍，近一周来，全国现有境外输入确诊病例持续下降，但经陆地边境输入风险逐渐上升，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B2%E6%9C%89%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#已有入境城市出现本土关联病例#</a>，进而引发聚集型疫情。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495803936176842:1042163-video:1042163%3A4495803839086604:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495803936176842:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wYrFtg" alt="http://t.cn/A6wYrFtg" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制定于4月20日15时召开新闻发布会，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E4%BE%9D%E6%B3%95%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#介绍依法防控境外疫情输入最新情况#</a>，国家卫生健康委、海关总署、移民局、民航局有关司局负责人回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓↓转发关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495801327741305:1034-video:1034%3A4495813192122377:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495801327741305:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wYBJ4M" alt="http://t.cn/A6wYBJ4M" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【罕见高清画面：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%BC-15%E7%A9%BA%E4%B8%AD%E4%BC%99%E4%BC%B4%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E7%94%BB%E9%9D%A2%23&amp;from=default">#歼-15空中伙伴加油画面#</a>】近日，海军舰载航空兵某部连续多天组织歼-15舰载战斗机进行空中加油、近距空战、夜间编队等实战化课目跨昼夜飞行训练。随着指挥员一声令下，多批次、多架次歼-15舰载战斗机依次起飞，奔赴目标空域，随即开展空中加油训练。（中国军视网）&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEbPUxKyV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495786228043813:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495786228043813&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">

        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495778829946915" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEbDYFJE7?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 13:31" date="1587360663000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495778829946915:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 13:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%98%E5%91%98%E7%A7%B0%E7%BE%A4%E4%BD%93%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%8D%E9%80%82%E5%90%88%E6%9C%AC%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#德国官员称群体免疫不适合本国#</a>】19日，德国总理府部长黑尔格·布劳恩表示，“群体免疫”是指，当人口中约60%至70%的人被感染并康复，疾病暴发的几率就会大大降低。但若要在18个月内让一半以上德国人口免疫，每天需有7.3万人感染新冠肺炎，而德国医疗系统将无法承受这种压力，因此，“群体免疫”不适 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEbDYFJE7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495778829946915:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495778829946915&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495766699130099" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEbkpCj9F?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 12:42" date="1587357770000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495766699130099:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 12:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B1%9F%E8%A5%BF%E4%B8%80%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E5%A5%96%E5%8A%B1%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A48.6%E4%B8%87%E5%85%83%23&amp;from=default">#江西一医院奖励援鄂医护8.6万元#</a>、14天带薪年假】近日，江西某医院“奖励援鄂医护每人86666元”的消息引发关注。收到奖金的三名援鄂医护人员分别是该院急诊ICU主任易勇、急诊ICU护士长卢美玲、内二科护士长谢秋霞。院方表示，86666元的奖金分为三部分，一是对援鄂的英雄奖励66666元，二是对其家属的 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEbkpCj9F" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495766699130099:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495766699130099&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495738123727679" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEaAkfDJR?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 10:49" date="1587350958000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495738123727679:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 10:49</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【最高法：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%85%E4%BB%A5%E5%8A%B3%E5%8A%A8%E8%80%85%E6%9D%A5%E8%87%AA%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%A5%E9%87%8D%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E8%A7%A3%E9%9B%87%E4%B8%8D%E8%8E%B7%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%23&amp;from=default">#仅以劳动者来自疫情严重地区解雇不获支持#</a>】4月20日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E6%B3%95%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%B0%E6%B6%89%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%B0%91%E4%BA%8B%E6%A1%88%E4%BB%B6%E6%8C%87%E5%AF%BC%E6%84%8F%E8%A7%81%23&amp;from=default">#最高法出台涉疫情民事案件指导意见#</a>强调，要准确适用《劳动法》《劳动合同法》的相关规定。用人单位仅以劳动者是新冠肺炎确诊患者、疑似新冠肺炎患者、无症状感染者、被依法隔离人员或者劳动者来自疫情相对严重的地区为由主张解除劳动 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEaAkfDJR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495738123727679:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495738123727679&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->

            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->

                                <a name="4495732746725213" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEarEsdxb?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 10:27" date="1587349676000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495732746725213:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 10:27</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%A4%E9%A2%97%E5%B0%8F%E8%A1%8C%E6%98%9F%E5%B0%86%E4%B8%8E%E5%9C%B0%E7%90%83%E6%93%A6%E8%82%A9%E8%80%8C%E8%BF%87%23&amp;from=default">#两颗小行星将与地球擦肩而过#</a> 科学家：不会对地球造成影响】从中科院紫金山天文台了解到，4月底到5月初，将有两颗存在潜在威胁的近地小行星与地球“擦肩而过”：编号为52768的小行星将于北京时间29日17时56分飞掠地球；小行星2020DM4预计将于北京时间5月1日18时05分左右飞掠地球。但不会对地球产生 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEarEsdxb" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495732746725213:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495732746725213&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4495737515422895&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=3216996295&amp;commentmid=4495732746725213" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>1264</em></span></a>                    </span></li>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-20 10:46</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495718834241049" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEa5dhNi1?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 09:32" date="1587346359000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495718834241049:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 09:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E4%B8%AD%E7%8E%AF4%E5%B9%A2%E7%83%82%E5%B0%BE%E6%A5%BC%E5%87%8C%E6%99%A8%E5%AE%8C%E6%88%90%E7%88%86%E7%A0%B4%23&amp;from=default">#上海中环4幢烂尾楼凌晨完成爆破#</a>】4月20日凌晨0时30分，矗立近二十年的上海中环中心4幢主体均超20层楼的烂尾楼被同一时间爆破拆除。将来这里将被打造成多元功能于一体的城市综合体。有网友听到响动怀疑是地震，随后<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E5%B1%80?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=上海市地震局">@上海市地震局</a> 紧急辟谣，请市民不要恐慌。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%B7%A8%E5%93%8D%23&amp;from=default">#上海巨响#</a><a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4495718834241049:1034-video:1034%3A4495717138366509:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495718834241049:2803301701" title="澎湃新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wj1ldj" alt="http://t.cn/A6wj1ldj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>澎湃新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4495705168955577" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IE9JaBzKN?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-20 08:38" date="1587343101000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4495705168955577:fromprofile"> 2020-4-20 08:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E8%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增8例境外输入病例#</a>】4月19日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例12例，其中8例为境外输入病例。境外输入现有确诊病例841例（含重症病例43例），现有疑似病例39例。累计确诊病例1583例，累计治愈出院病例742例，无死亡病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%8549%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增无症状感染者49例#</a>】31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者49例，其中境外输入无症状感染者5例；当日无转为确诊病例；当日解除医学观察58例（境外输入7例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者990例（境外输入184例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_handle W_fr">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A12%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊12例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增4例本土病例#</a>】4月19日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例12例，其中8例为境外输入病例，4例为本土病例（黑龙江3例，内蒙古1例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入疑似病例（上海2例）。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IE9I71mxu" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495704510324972:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495704510324972&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=7362840672&amp;cid=4495704699229583&amp;nick=狗千&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-20 08:36</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增1例境外输入确诊病例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%8518%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增无症状感染者18例#</a>】截至4月19日24时，广东省新增境外输入确诊病例1例，广州报告（来自英国，通过入境口岸发现，入关后即被隔离观察）。累计报告境外输入病例191例。全省累计报告新冠肺炎确诊病例1581例，累计出院1494例，累计死亡8例。新增出院4例。在院79 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IE9Gw4TJu" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4495703521167552:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4495703521167552&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4495703521167552"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1039</em></span></span></span></a>

                                                                                          【夜读：最好的爱，是成全】关于爱，每个人都有自己的理解。不管方式如何，最重要的一定是能够为对方带去点什么。如果你不知道怎么表达你的爱，那就去成全你爱的那个人。其实，成全一个你爱的人，也是在成全自己的爱。这种微妙的羁绊，也是一世的温暖。 <a  suda-uatrack=\"key=tblog_card&value=click_title:4495931539501705:1022-article:1022%3A2309404495931541159979:page_100206_home:2803301701:4495931539501705:2803301701\" title=\"【夜读】最好的爱，是成全\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6wHqJak\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6wHqJak\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb\">&#xb0;<\/i>【夜读】最好的爱，是成全<\/a> ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                                <div class=\"WB_expand_media_box \" style=\"display: none;\" node-type=\"feed_list_media_disp\"><\/div>\n                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->\n<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->\n                                                                                                              【习近平在陕西考察秦岭生态保护情况】习近平总书记20日在陕西考察调研。当天下午，他首先来到位于商洛市柞水县的秦岭牛背梁国家级自然保护区，考察秦岭生态保护情况。之后前往小岭镇金米村，了解脱贫攻坚工作情况。（文字记者：杜尚泽&nbsp;&nbsp;摄影记者：鞠鹏、谢环驰、燕雁、翟健岚） ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4495920060112312:fromprofile\"> 2020-4-20 22:52<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\" class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" >\n                                                                                                                        【人民微评：炒票，严惩！】天价国际机票肥了少数人，却让航空公司背了骂名，更拦住了海外同胞回家的路。票价惊人，与供不应求有关，也与不法中介有关。暂停代理企业销售国际机票，特殊时期的无奈之举，反衬出一些代理肆无忌惮无底线。倒票、炒票涉嫌违规违法，必须制止，更需依法处理。                                            <\/div>\n                                                                        <div class=\"WB_feed_expand\">\n                    <div class=\"W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t\"><i class=\"S_bg1_br\"><\/i><\/div>\n                    <div class=\"WB_expand S_bg1\" node-type=\"feed_list_forwardContent\">\n                                                                            <div class=\"WB_info\">\n                                <a suda-uatrack=\"key=feed_headnick&value=transuser_nick:4495811985111917\" node-type='feed_list_originNick' class=\"W_fb S_txt1\" nick-name=\"人民日报\" bpfilter=\"page_frame\" href=\"\/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_\" title=\"人民日报\" usercard=\"id=2803301701&refer_flag=1005055013_\">@人民日报<\/a><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/fuwu.biz.weibo.com\"><i title= \"微博官方认证\" class=\"WB_text\" node-type=\"feed_list_reason\">\n                                                                                                                                        【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E8%88%AA%E5%B1%80%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%9C%BA%E7%A5%A8%E7%82%92%E8%87%B310%E4%B8%87%E5%85%83%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%23&from=default\">#民航局回应国际机票炒至10万元以上#<\/a>：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%9A%82%E5%81%9C%E4%BB%A3%E7%90%86%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E9%94%80%E5%94%AE%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%9C%BA%E7%A5%A8%23&from=default\">#暂停代理企业销售国际机票#<\/a>】中国民用航空局运行监控中心副主任孙韶华透露，调减国际航班后，少数代理企业通过虚占座位、更换旅客姓名等方式倒票、抢票，有的机票炒到10万元以上。民航局要求4月16日起暂停各销售代理企业的国际机票代理权，全部国际渠道必须通 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4495811985111917:2803301701\" href=\"\/2803301701\/IEcvslrQh\" action-type=\"fl_unfold\" suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4495911260514197:fromprofile\"> 2020-4-20 22:17<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\" action-type=\"app_source\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https:\/\/app.weibo.com\/t\/feed\/6vtZb0\" rel=\"nofollow\">微博 weibo.com<\/a>            \t            <\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民日报\">\n                                                                                                                        【谢谢每一份爱的回馈！致敬<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%94%A8%E8%A1%8C%E5%8A%A8%E4%BC%A0%E9%80%92%E7%9A%84%E6%9A%96%E6%84%8F%23&from=default\">#疫情中用行动传递的暖意#<\/a><img class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/8a\/2018new_xin_org.png\" title=\"[心]\" alt=    \"[心]\" type=\"face\" \/>】她是留学生，隔离结束后，选择到隔离点做志愿者，“把温暖传递下去”；他是新冠疫苗志愿者，他说自己只是个普通人，“有太多人为我们拼过命，现在该轮到我了”…这是<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E8%AE%A9%E4%BA%BA%E6%B3%AA%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%E6%9A%96%E5%BF%83%E5%9B%9E%E9%A6%88%23&from=default\">#疫情中让人泪目的暖心回馈#<\/a>↓谢谢你们，所有感受过温暖并将它传递的人。                                                                                                              【冰雪世界！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E5%AF%B9%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E5%88%9D%E4%B8%89%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%23&from=default\">#广州对返校初三高三学生全部核酸检测#<\/a>】4月20日，广州市副市长黎明透露，广州决定对首批返校的近3万名教职员工、16.7万名初三和高三学生全部开展核酸检测。今后一段时间，广州将根据防控工作的需要，不断动态调整应检尽检的对象。<a  title=\"广州：对返校初三、高三学生全部开展核酸检测\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6wTgvo3\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6wTgvo3\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon 从美国平安抵达天津，将在天津接受隔离14天。她表示：“感谢大家的关心。飞机上都很顺利。体温都正常。我们终于回来了，走的时候还在下雪，现在已经春暖花开了。等待检疫，隔离。” ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                【教育部考试中心：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%235%E6%9C%88%E6%89%98%E7%A6%8F%E9%9B%85%E6%80%9DGRE%E7%AD%89%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E5%8F%96%E6%B6%88%23&from=default\">#5月托福雅思GRE等海外考试取消#<\/a>】20日，教育部考试中心发布通知<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%235%E6%9C%88%E5%A4%9A%E4%B8%AA%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E5%8F%96%E6%B6%88%23&from=default\">#5月多个海外考试取消#<\/a>：①取消2020年5月所有托福、雅思、GRE、GMAT考试，考试费将全额退还至考生个人报名账户。②取消2020年5月16日举行的KET、PET青少版考试。③推迟举行原定于2020年5月16、23、30日举行的剑桥商务 style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民日报\">\n                                                                                                                        【我国<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%90%E5%B9%B4%E4%BA%BA%E4%BA%BA%E5%9D%87%E9%98%85%E8%AF%BB%E7%BA%B8%E8%B4%A8%E4%B9%A64.65%E6%9C%AC%23&from=default\">#成年人人均阅读纸质书4.65本#<\/a>，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%89%E6%88%90%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%9C%89%E5%90%AC%E4%B9%A6%E4%B9%A0%E6%83%AF%23&from=default\">#三成以上中国人有听书习惯#<\/a>】20日，第十七次全国国民阅读调查成果发布。从成年国民对各类出版物阅读量的考察看，2019年我国成年国民人均纸质图书阅读量为4.65本，低于2018年的4.67本；有三成以上的国民有听书习惯。一波书单推荐↓↓今天，你读书了吗？ ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                                <div class=\"WB_expand_media_box \" style=\"display: none;\"
